subject: CNN Alerts: bush

CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Bush mail brings big-box stores to Alaska's hinterlands

05/15/07 08:04 AM, EDT
Diane Seitz, a teacher in the tiny village of Koyukuk, reels off the prices at the village's only store, a weathered wood shanty with three meagerly stocked aisles and no regular business hours.
FULL STORY
